content: The Fireproof Mantle is one of the Vessels you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. These Vessels give you powerful, active abilities that completely change combat for a brief moment, enhancing your power, defense, and more.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fireproof_Mantle.md', within the main section titled 'Fireproof Mantle'.
The content is as follows:
The Fireproof Mantle is one of the Vessels you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. These Vessels give you powerful, active abilities that completely change combat for a brief moment, enhancing your power, defense, and more.
